description: I want to be able to calculate the principal value
based on my inputs when pressing the Beregn-button

steps.name: the user inputs are "0", "0", "1", and "A"
bank_fees equals "0" and bank_bond_fee equals "0"
the user press the beregn button
the principal amount is calculated and equals "0"
the user inputs are "0", "0", "1", and "A"
bank_fees equals "100" and bank_bond_fee equals "0"
the user press the beregn button
the principal amount is calculated and equals "100"
the user inputs are "0", "0", "0.5", and "A"
bank_fees equals "100" and bank_bond_fee equals "0"
the user press the beregn button
the principal amount is calculated and equals "200"
the user inputs are "0", "0", "1", and "A"
bank_fees equals "100" and bank_bond_fee equals "0.5"
the user press the beregn button
the principal amount is calculated and equals "200"
the user inputs are "100", "0", "0.25", and "A"
bank_fees equals "0" and bank_bond_fee equals "0"
the user press the beregn button
the principal amount is calculated and equals "400"
the user inputs are "100", "0", "0.25", and "A"
bank_fees equals "100" and bank_bond_fee equals "0"
the user press the beregn button
the principal amount is calculated and equals "800"
the user inputs are "100", "0", "0.25", and "A"
bank_fees equals "100" and bank_bond_fee equals "0.05"
the user press the beregn button
the principal amount is calculated and equals "1000"
the user inputs are "100", "50", "0.25", and "A"
bank_fees equals "0" and bank_bond_fee equals "0"
the user press the beregn button
the principal amount is calculated and equals "200"
the user inputs are "100", "50", "0.25", and "A"
bank_fees equals "100" and bank_bond_fee equals "0"
the user press the beregn button
the principal amount is calculated and equals "600"
the user inputs are "100", "50", "0.25", and "A"
bank_fees equals "100" and bank_bond_fee equals "0.05"
the user press the beregn button
the principal amount is calculated and equals "750"
the user inputs are "0", "0", "1.02", and "A"
bank_fees equals "20_000" and bank_bond_fee equals "0.02"
the user press the beregn button
the principal amount is calculated and equals "20_000"
the user inputs are "200", "100", "1.02", and "A"
bank_fees equals "18_000" and bank_bond_fee equals "0.02"
the user press the beregn button
the principal amount is calculated and equals "18_100"

name: Principal Calculation Feature

description: If my user inputs are valid
I want the processor to return the processed user inputs

steps.name: the user inputs for the processor are "0", "1", "3", and "A"
the user inputs are processed
the processer runs without errors and return "{'house_price': 0, 'down_payment': 1, 'bond_price': 0.03, 'dropdown': 'A'}"
the user inputs for the processor are "1", "0", "3", and "A"
the user inputs are processed
the processer runs without errors and return "{'house_price': 1, 'down_payment': 0, 'bond_price': 0.03, 'dropdown': 'A'}"
the user inputs for the processor are "1", "1", "2,001", and "A"
the user inputs are processed
the processer runs without errors and return "{'house_price': 1, 'down_payment': 1, 'bond_price': 0.02001, 'dropdown': 'A'}"
the user inputs for the processor are "10.000.000", "1", "3", and "A"
the user inputs are processed
the processer runs without errors and return "{'house_price': 10_000_000, 'down_payment': 1, 'bond_price': 0.03, 'dropdown': 'A'}"
the user inputs for the processor are "1", "10.000.000", "3", and "A"
the user inputs are processed
the processer runs without errors and return "{'house_price': 1, 'down_payment': 10_000_000, 'bond_price': 0.03, 'dropdown': 'A'}"
the user inputs for the processor are "1", "1", "200", and "A"
the user inputs are processed
the processer runs without errors and return "{'house_price': 1, 'down_payment': 1, 'bond_price': 2, 'dropdown': 'A'}"
the user inputs for the processor are "1.000.000", "50.000", "95", and "A"
the user inputs are processed
the processer runs without errors and return "{'house_price': 1_000_000, 'down_payment': 50_000, 'bond_price': 0.95, 'dropdown': 'A'}"

name: Validate ProcessUserInput with correct inputs Feature

I want the processor to fail
